scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --sourcemap && tsc -p tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly && bun run ./scripts/add-shebang.ts
scripts.build:binary:linux: bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --minify --sourcemap --define BUILD_VERSION='"$(bun --version)"' --define BUILD_TIME='"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)"' --define BUILD_TARGET='"linux-x64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/mcpgen-linux-x64
scripts.build:binary:macos: bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --minify --sourcemap --define BUILD_VERSION='"$(bun --version)"' --define BUILD_TIME='"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)"' --define BUILD_TARGET='"darwin-x64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/mcpgen-macos-x64
scripts.build:binary:windows: bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify --sourcemap --define BUILD_VERSION='"$(bun --version)"' --define BUILD_TIME='"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)"' --define BUILD_TARGET='"windows-x64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/mcpgen-windows-x64.exe
